message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $12,000. I believe this product would be highly beneficial for you, even at that price.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Thanks for your interest, Bob.  While I appreciate your offer, I know the value of this product, and I can't let it go for less than $11,000. I'm confident it will bring you a good return at that price.

Hi Alice, I understand your concerns about the value of the product, but I'm still looking to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,500. I think that's a fair compromise considering the value you've placed on the product.
